name: 2022 the 4th World Symposium on Artificial Intelligence
content: Conference Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be included in WSAI 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published by IEEE, archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services. WSAI 2022 is listed in IEEE conference calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/55384
